snippet: The pilot whose helicopter crashed in the East River was at the helm of a plane that made an emergency landing in a Brooklyn park five years ago.
lead_paragraph: The pilot whose helicopter crashed in the East River was at the helm of a plane that made an emergency landing in a Brooklyn park five years ago.

headline.main: At Controls of Doomed Aircraft, a Pilot With Experience
headline.print_headline: At Controls of Doomed Aircraft, a Pilot With Experience
headline.seo: Pilot in East River Crash Forced to Make Emergency Landing in 2006
